description: [MgBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1146) includes a module for establishing a process watchdog for itself, identifying if the [MgBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1146) process is still running.(Citation: Symantec Daggerfly 2023)

external_references.description: Threat Hunter Team. (2023, April 20). Daggerfly: APT Actor Targets Telecoms Company in Africa. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
